news.title: Sapiom raises $15M to help AI agents buy their own tech tools
news.summary: The startup -- with backing from Accel -- is building a financial layer that handles the authentication and micro-payments required for AI agents.

news.title: Reddit looks to AI search as its next big opportunity
news.summary: During the company's fourth-quarter earnings call on Thursday, it offered an update on its plans to merge traditional and AI search together and hinted that although search is not yet monetized, "it's an enormous market and opportunity."

news.title: AWS revenue continues to soar as cloud demand remains high
news.summary: AWS recorded its best quarter, in terms of revenue growth, in 13 quarters in Q4 2025 as AI drives AWS adoption.

news.title: Amazon and Google are winning the AI capex race — but what’s the prize?
news.summary: In 2026, Amazon plans to spend $200 billion in capex. Google is just behind at $175 billion to $185 billion. It's a lot of money!

news.title: The Washington Post is retreating from Silicon Valley when it matters most
news.summary: The Bezos-owned newspaper gutted its San Francisco bureau and coverage of tech — including journalists reporting on Amazon and Blue Origin.

news.title: Google is expanding AirDrop support to more Android devices ‘very soon’
news.summary: After introducing AirDrop support to Pixel 10 devices last year, Google is now set to expand it to phones made by other Android partners. news.title: HBO is turning Baldur’s Gate into a TV show
news.summary: HBO is developing a Baldur's Gate TV show that will continue the story of Larian Studios' hit RPG Baldur's Gate 3, according to Deadline. news.title: Roblox is working to pull in adult players
news.summary: After rolling out age verification last year, Roblox is aiming to grow the number of players over 18 on its platform. news.title: Republicans attack ‘woke’ Netflix — and ignore YouTube
news.summary: When Netflix co-CEO Ted Sarandos entered the Senate office building on Tuesday, he got thrown a curveball. news.title: Iron Lung’s path to theaters was unique, even if the movie isn’t
news.summary: As a movie, Iron Lung is occasionally thrilling but mostly forgettable. It's a small-budget horror flick that has some cool ideas and pulls them off in an extremely efficient way, creating a sense of tension that unfortunately never turns into outright scares. news.title: Why Darren Aronofsky thought an AI-generated historical docudrama was a good idea
news.summary: Production source says it takes "weeks" to produce just minutes of usable video.

news.title: AI companies want you to stop chatting with bots and start managing them
news.summary: Claude Opus 4.6 and OpenAI Frontier pitch a future of supervising AI agents.

news.title: The Switch 2 is getting a new Virtual Console (kind of)
news.summary: Hamster Corp.'s new "Console Archives" does what Nintendon't.

news.title: With GPT-5.3-Codex, OpenAI pitches Codex for more than just writing code
news.summary: The emphasis is on "mid-turn steering and frequent progress updates."

news.title: "ICE Out of Our Faces Act" would ban ICE and CBP use of facial recognition
news.summary: Senator: ICE and CBP "have built an arsenal of surveillance technologies."

news.title: Waymo Hits a Rough Patch In Washington, DC
news.summary: The company’s robotaxi service is supposed to launch in the US capital this year. But while service rollouts have been relatively smooth in other cities, DC’s rules have made things tricky.

news.title: Why the Artemis II Crew Stays in Quarantine Before Their Journey to Moon
news.summary: For two weeks, medical experts monitor the astronauts as they remain indoors, live in isolation, and avoid physical touch, all to prevent harmful microbes from traveling to space.

news.title: Why a Dehumidifier Is One of My Favorite Gadgets
news.summary: A good dehumidifier can banish damp and mold, and help you keep a comfortable temperature in your home.

news.title: Figure Skaters at the 2026 Winter Olympics Are Pushing the Limits of What’s Possible
news.summary: For years, quad axel jumps seemed impossible. Then Ilia Malinin landed one in 2022. As he heads to the Milano Cortina Games, everyone wants to know what’s next.

news.title: Public Health Workers Are Quitting Over Assignments to Guantánamo
news.summary: Doctors, nurses, and other officers are increasingly being deployed to ICE detention centers. Some have resigned in protest, while others offer a rare look into bleak conditions.
